item.title: How an Elite Public High School Set Mamdani on the Path to Politics
item.description: Zohran Mamdani’s time at the Bronx High School of Science expanded and helped shape his views of New York, from the cricket pitch to politics.

item.title: George Santos and President Trump’s Theory of Mercy
item.description: More than any other presidential actions, clemencies tell us who presidents are.

item.title: A Boston Restaurant Displayed Whitey Bulger’s Mug Shot. An Uproar Ensued.
item.description: The owners of Savin Bar & Kitchen have so far rejected requests from residents to remove photos of gangsters who terrorized the city for decades.
